desc.name: Provide quality and timely feedback to Microverse students on their technical projects.
Ensure the quality of source code and conducting code and UI reviews.
Propose improvements to code organization to improve code quality and overall performance.
Responsible for implementing visual elements that our users see and interact with within our websites.
Ensuring a perfect balance between our User\"s Experience (UX) and our User's Interface (UI).
Manage Training Academy database and ensures they are organized, stored and secured.
Train young girls, ages 9 - 18, SCRATCH programming language during  summer camps.
Help build confidence and career orientation in STEM through outreach programs.
Sensitize young girls on Leadership, Technology and Basic Etiquettes.
